jmines.control.actions.displayandsounds
Class ChangeColor

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      jmines.control.actions.JMinesAction
          jmines.control.actions.displayandsounds.ChangeColor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChangeBackgroundColor, ChangeButtonsColor, ChangeLCDColor
public abstract class ChangeColor
extends JMinesAction

The super class of all change color actions (for background, LCD and buttons) used in JMines.

Author:
Zleurtor
